## getAll
### Description:

The getAll method retrieves all data from a specified table.

## Usage:

````javascript
const db = new ArletDb('path/to/database', 'myDatabase');
db.getAll('users')
  .then(data => console.log('All data:', data))
  .catch(err => console.error('Error:', err));
````
